message: All metadata fields for the indicator 11-a-1, translated into en
data: Goal 11. Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable11.a Foster the establishment of positive economic, social and environmental links between urban, peri-urban and rural areas by strengthening development planning at the national and regional levels11.a.1 Proportion of inhabitants living in cities that implement urban and regional development plans taking into account demographic projections and necessary resources, by city sizecategory IIIRatio between the population or households living in cities that implement urban and regional development plans taking into account demographic projections and the necessary resources, according to the size of the city and the total population or all households in the national territoryNot available
